div.p: Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Endpoint|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

tr.td: Element `Endpoint.connectionType` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.connectionType` as `SourceIsBroaderThanTarget`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.
Element `Endpoint.description` has a context of Endpoint based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Endpoint`.
Element `Endpoint.environmentType` has a context of Endpoint based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Endpoint`.
Element `Endpoint.payload.type` has a context of Endpoint based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Endpoint`.

title.value: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 Endpoint to FHIR R4 Endpoint

description.value: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 Endpoint to FHIR R4.
